full_summary:
## High Arctic Data Communication System Tender Announcement

### Notice Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013799
* **Modification Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** W6369-220287
* **Publication Date:** November 17, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2022 02:00 PM (EST)
* **Amendment Date:** November 24, 2022
* **Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Contract End Date:** N/A
* **Tender Status:** Exired
* **Tender Category:** Goods and Services
* **Notice Type:** Request for Information

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (CLCA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nunavut Territory

### Notice Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking feedback from Inuit Firms and Industry regarding the replacement of the power supply system of the High Arctic Data Communication Systems (HADCS) Microwave (MW) repeater system. This Letter of Interest (LOI) aims to:

* Allow Inuit Firms and Industry to review and provide feedback to the requirements as set out in the Draft Statement of Work Overview
* Provide information on the HADCS mandatory Inuit Benefit requirements
* Inform and engage Inuit Firms and Industry on legislative, policy, and certifications required to meet the operational requirements

This is a Request for Information (RFI) to obtain feedback and information to assist Canada in finalizing the requirements and in developing achievable objectives and deliverables. 

### Additional Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* The procurement documents include Annexes A to E, which can be found at [url].

### Contact Information

* Adrien Dubois, Contracting Authority
* Email: [adrien.dubois@forces.gc.ca](mailto:adrien.dubois@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-576-2804
* Address: 60 Moodie Dr, Nepean, ON K2H 8G1, Canada.  The contact and address details above are provided in English. The French language equivalent is available on request.
